text:
that you’re only field? whats the error? If that’s all the code in your fields.json file, then add brackets around the field
```[
 {
  "name" : "description",
  "label" : "Description",
  "required" : false,
  "locked" : false,
  "type" : "richtext",
  "default" : null,
  "enabled_features" : ["bold","link","image"]
 }
]```
